title: The development of anti-freezing and anti-evaporating conductive organohydrogel for flexible strain-sensing electronic devices
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30886-30895
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04601C, Paper

Rafi Ullah, Latafat Ara, Muhammad Tahir Khan, Luqman Ali Shah, Hazizan Md Akil, Zafar Ullah Khan, Hyeong-Min Yoo
The organohydrogels with excellent flexibility, mechanical strength, conductivity, and response to external stimuli, having stability at subzero temperature were prepared.
